titleStmt.title: The case of the daughters of the late Earl of Rochester, and grandaughters and heirs to John Mallet, Esquire, as to their bill for settling the navigation of the new cut river, leading from Bridgewater to Taunton.

notesStmt.note: Half-title on p. [2]: The case of the co-heirs of John late Earl of Rochester deceased.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library.
